sections.heading: Code, how cited.Sections 28-101 to 28-1357, 28-1601 to 28-1603, and 28-1701 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Criminal Code
28-101 to 28-1357, 28-1601 to 28-1603, and 28-1701 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Criminal Code.
sections.text: 28-101 to 28-1357, 28-1601 to 28-1603, and 28-1701 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Criminal Code.
